SEARCH

Class AbstractApplication

java.lang.Object
AbstractApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Application
Direct Known Subclasses:
Mock.MockApplication
public abstract class AbstractApplication extends Object implements Application
Skeletal implementation of the Application interface to minimize the effort required to implement it.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • sendMessage

      public boolean sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends a Message from this AbstractApplication to another Device and Application. Returns whether this Message was successfully sent to another Device or Application.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface Application
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to be sent from this Application
      Returns:
      whether the Message was successfully sent and received
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when the message is null Logs a warning message when this Application is not connected to a port, so it can't receive a Message Calls device.sendMessage(message)

    • sendBroadcastMessage

      public boolean sendBroadcastMessage(String payload)
      Broadcast a Message to any Device open to receiving them. Return whether this Message was successfully broadcast.
      Specified by:
      sendBroadcastMessage in interface Application
      Parameters:
      payload - the contents of the Message that was broadcast
      Returns:
      whether this Message was successfully broadcast
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when the payload is null Logs a warning message and returns false when the payload is not a binary string Logs a warning message when this Application is not connected to a port, so it can't receive a Message Calls device.sendBroadcastMessage(payload)
